captions.text: Everyone... I brought in baby wipes if you need them.
Dale... I'm returning your man-shaped dildo.

Sorry. I read through all your emails. You should really call Peggy back.
I lost my band in there.
I don't want THEM to see us like this!
I wish you would just shut the #%*@ up.
He ate a blue cupcake today.
